call_summary.final_outcome: The caller inquired about a settlement check and disputed the disbursement amount. The receptionist attempted to transfer the caller to the disbursement department, but the staff member was unavailable. The caller agreed to a callback from the head of the disbursement team.

transfer_context.description: The receptionist attempted to connect the caller to the head of the disbursement team while the caller was on hold, but the staff member was in a meeting and unavailable to take the call.
